data.text:
Thoda Thoda Pyaar – Stebin Ben

“Thoda Thoda Pyaar” is a fresh addition to the landscape of Indian music, marking a significant collaboration between popular artists and talented music producers. Released under the Zee Music Originals banner, the song features an engaging mix of romance and melody, with Sidharth Malhotra and Neha Sharma gracing the screen, and Stebin Ben and…

295 – Sidhu Moose Wala

Sidhu Moosewala, a name synonymous with Punjabi music, has once again made headlines with his track “295.” Released as part of his much-anticipated album Moosetape, the song is a powerful blend of lyrical prowess, emotive delivery, and potent themes. Produced by The Kidd, "295" stands out not only for its musical quality but also for its…

Arabic Kuthu – Anirudh Ravichander & Jonita Gandhi

The song "Arabic Kuthu" from the Tamil film Beast has taken the music world by storm with its infectious rhythm, vibrant visuals, and captivating performances. Featuring the charismatic Thalapathy Vijay and the stunning Pooja Hegde, the track has quickly become a sensation, garnering attention both in India and internationally. This article…

O Saki Saki – Neha Kakkar, Tulsi Kumar & B Praak

The song "O Saki Saki," featured in the Bollywood film Batla House, has captured the essence of high-energy dance music and become a notable hit in recent years. Featuring Nora Fatehi, the track blends elements of traditional and contemporary music, showcasing the talents of various artists including Tanishk Bagchi, Neha Kakkar, Tulsi Kumar, B…

Naah – Harrdy Sandhu

Released in 2017, "Naah" by Harrdy Sandhu, featuring Nora Fatehi, is a song that captivated audiences with its catchy beats and compelling visuals. Created by a powerhouse team including Jaani for lyrics and B Praak for music, the song quickly became a significant hit, resonating with fans across various demographics. This article delves into the…

Backbone – Harrdy Sandhu

Released in 2017, "Backbone" by Harrdy Sandhu quickly captured the hearts of music lovers with its melodious blend of romance and contemporary sound. Featuring lyrics by Jaani, music composed by B Praak, and a vibrant production by Zenith Sidhu, the song has become an iconic piece in the modern Punjabi music landscape. This article delves into the…

Lavandiya London Se Layenge – Ritesh Pandey | लवंडिया लंदन से लाएँगे

"Lavandiya London Se Layenge," performed by Ritesh Pandey and released by Worldwide Records Bhojpuri, has become a significant hit in the Bhojpuri music scene. With its energetic beats, catchy lyrics, and engaging visuals, this song represents a blend of traditional Bhojpuri music with contemporary influences. The track has captured the hearts of…

Cheez Badi – Udit Narayan and Neha Kakkar

The song "Cheez Badi" from the Bollywood film Machine stands as a notable example of the contemporary Bollywood music scene, merging upbeat rhythms with engaging visuals. Released under the banner of T-Series, this track has captured the attention of audiences with its lively beats and dynamic performances. Featuring Mustafa and Kiara Advani, and…

Feelings – Sumit Goswami

Sumit Goswami’s track "Feelings," featuring KHATRI and Deepesh Goyal, is a standout in the realm of Haryanvi music. Released in 2020, this song captures the essence of contemporary Haryanvi pop with its relatable lyrics, engaging beats, and captivating music video. Goswami, known for his unique blend of traditional Haryanvi elements with modern…

Made In India – Guru Randhawa

"Made in India," a dynamic track by Guru Randhawa, stands as a vibrant testament to the singer's ability to blend traditional Punjabi sounds with contemporary beats. Released under the T-Series banner and directed by Gifty, the song features Elnaaz Norouzi and showcases Randhawa’s signature style of energetic and engaging music. With its catchy…

Sakhiyaan – Maninder Buttar

"Sakhiyaan" by Maninder Buttar has established itself as a significant track in the Punjabi music industry, captivating listeners with its engaging melody, heartfelt lyrics, and dynamic production. Released under the Ishtar Punjabi label, this song has become a favorite among fans of Punjabi music. With MixSingh's masterful production and Babbu's…

Dheere Dheere Se Meri Zindagi – Yo Yo Honey Singh

The song "Dheere Dheere Se Meri Zindagi" is a contemporary romantic hit that has made waves in the Indian music industry. Featuring Hrithik Roshan and Sonam Kapoor, this track, which is a modern rendition of a classic Bollywood tune, was brought to life by Yo Yo Honey Singh's vibrant music and innovative approach. Released as part of the film…

Srivalli – Javed Ali

The song "Srivalli" from the blockbuster Telugu film Pushpa: The Rise has captured hearts with its enchanting melody and evocative visuals. Featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, and performed by Javed Ali, the track is a testament to the film's ability to blend compelling storytelling with captivating music. Composed by Devi Sri Prasad (DSP)…

Sankat Mochan Hanuman Ashtak – HARIHARAN संकटमोचन हनुमान अष्टक

The "Sankat Mochan Hanuman Ashtakshara" is a devotional song that holds a revered place in Hindu spiritual practices. Sung by the renowned artist Hariharan, this hymn is dedicated to Lord Hanuman, one of the most venerated deities in Hinduism. Known for his unwavering devotion and immense strength, Hanuman is often worshipped for relief from…

Taaron Ke Shehar – Neha Kakkar & Jubin Nautiyal

In the ever-evolving landscape of contemporary music, certain songs manage to capture the essence of human emotions with remarkable depth and clarity. One such track is "Taaron Ke Shehar," a poignant and evocative song that has resonated with audiences for its melodious charm and heartfelt lyrics. Featuring the captivating vocals of Neha Kakkar and…

Besharam Rang – Shilpa Rao, Caralisa Monteiro, Vishal and Sheykhar

In the ever-evolving landscape of Bollywood music, certain tracks capture the essence of their films with an indelible charm, setting the stage for the cinematic experience they complement. "Besharam Rang" from the much-anticipated film Pathaan is a prime example of such a track. Featuring the charismatic duo Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone,…

Kaun Hain Voh – Kailash Kher & Mounima

The magnum opus Baahubali: The Beginning, directed by S.S. Rajamouli, redefined Indian cinema with its epic storytelling, grand visuals, and compelling music. Among the many memorable tracks from this cinematic marvel, "Kaun Hain Voh" stands out as a powerful anthem that beautifully captures the essence of the film's grandeur and mystery. Featuring…

Hua Hain Aaj Pehli Baar – Armaan Malik & Palak Muchhal

In the realm of Bollywood romantic music, some songs manage to beautifully capture the essence of love and the myriad emotions associated with it. "Hua Hain Aaj Pehli Baar" from the 2016 film Sanam Re stands out as a quintessential example of how music can evoke the feeling of first love and emotional awakening. Featuring the captivating voices of…

Jeene Laga Hoon – Atif Aslam and Shreya Ghoshal

In the realm of Bollywood romantic music, certain songs manage to capture the essence of love and longing with a magical blend of melody and lyrics. "Jeene Laga Hoon," a notable track from the 2013 film Ramaiya Vastavaiya, is one such gem. Featuring the enchanting voices of Atif Aslam and Shreya Ghoshal, this song has left an indelible mark on…

Blue Eyes – Yo Yo Honey Singh

In the vibrant world of Indian pop music, few tracks have managed to capture the public’s imagination as effectively as "Blue Eyes" by Yo Yo Honey Singh. Released in 2013, this song quickly became a cultural phenomenon, showcasing Honey Singh's distinctive style and solidifying his status as one of the leading figures in contemporary Indian music.…

She Don’t Know – Millind Gaba

In the ever-evolving landscape of contemporary Hindi music, certain tracks manage to carve out a unique niche, capturing the attention of listeners with their catchy tunes and engaging lyrics. One such track is "She Don't Know," a vibrant and upbeat song by Millind Gaba featuring Shabby. Released in 2019, this track quickly became a favorite among…

Ishare Tere – Guru Randhawa and Dhvani Bhanushali

The musical landscape of 2020 was graced with many notable tracks, but few stood out quite like "Ishare Tere," a hit single that became a sensation among fans of contemporary Indian pop music. Featuring the talents of Guru Randhawa and Dhvani Bhanushali, this track quickly garnered attention for its catchy beats, engaging lyrics, and stylish…

Wish – Diler Kharkiya

The Haryanvi music industry has seen a surge of vibrant and engaging tracks in recent years, but few have captured the essence of modern Haryanvi music quite like Diler Kharkiya’s "Wish." Released in 2020, this song features the talented Ginni Kapoor and has quickly become a favorite among fans of regional music. Known for its catchy beats,…

Pachtaoge – Arijit Singh

"Pachtaoge" is a poignant and melodious track that has resonated deeply with audiences since its release. Sung by the renowned Arijit Singh, this song features the dynamic performances of Vicky Kaushal and Nora Fatehi, with lyrics by Jaani and music composed by B Praak. Directed by Arvindr Khaira and produced by Bhushan Kumar under T-Series,…

Baarish Ki Jaaye – B Praak

The song "Baarish Ki Jaaye" is a poignant and melodious addition to the Indian music scene, combining the evocative voice of B Praak with the stellar performances of Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Sunanda Sharma. Released under the label of DM (Desi Melodies), the track has garnered significant attention for its emotional depth and cinematic presentation.…

Nashe Si Chadh Gayi – Arijit Singh & Caralisa Monteiro

The song "Nashe Si Chadh Gayi" from the 2016 Bollywood film Befikre stands out as a vibrant and intoxicating track that perfectly encapsulates the film’s youthful exuberance and romantic spirit. Featuring Ranveer Singh and Vaani Kapoor, with vocals by Arijit Singh and a composition by Vishal and Shekhar, this song is a testament to the film's…

Ve Maahi – Arijit Singh & Asees Kaur

The song "Ve Maahi" from the 2019 Bollywood film Kesari has captured the hearts of audiences with its moving melody and poignant lyrics. Featuring Akshay Kumar and Parineeti Chopra, and performed by Arijit Singh and Asees Kaur, this romantic track is a testament to the film's central themes of love, sacrifice, and bravery. The song, composed by…

Sanam Re – Arijit Singh

The title song of the 2016 Bollywood film Sanam Re has captured the hearts of audiences with its evocative melody and emotional depth. Featuring Pulkit Samrat, Yami Gautam, and Urvashi Rautela, and directed by Divya Khosla Kumar, the song has become a memorable piece of Bollywood music, reflecting the themes of love and longing that pervade the…

Saami Saami – Sunidhi Chauhan – Movie: Pushpa: The Rise

The song "Saami Saami" from the 2021 Telugu film Pushpa: The Rise has captivated audiences with its energetic beats, striking visuals, and vibrant performances. Directed by Sukumar and featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, this track has become a significant part of the film’s success. Composed by Devi Sri Prasad and sung by Sunidhi Chauhan,…
